events.text: You come across a derelict station drifting in orbit. Its hull is scarred, but faint power signatures remain.

choices.result: You salvage useful tech but scrape your hull in the process.
You stay on course, avoiding unnecessary risk.

events.text: A faint distress signal crackles through your comms.

choices.result: You assist a stranded freighter and earn their gratitude.
You conserve power and remain undetected.

events.text: Tiny meteors scatter across your path, pelting the hull.

choices.result: You sustain minor damage but reach the clear zone faster.
You waste some fuel but avoid the worst impacts.
